The dimensions of the  dataset are `r paste(dim(CR_78)[1],'rows and',dim(CR_78)[2],'columns')`.


```{r}

fgdb <- "H:/Projects/11000/11187/TS/Task 3/Scott County.gdb"
CR_78_seg <- readOGR(dsn=fgdb,layer="CR_78_1")

```


```{r}
CR_78$paths <- CR_78$path
x <- CR_78 %>% separate(paths,remove = TRUE,sep='#',into = paste('V',c(1:1000),sep = ''))

size <- sapply(x,function(x)all(is.na(x)))
min(which(size==TRUE))
colnames(x)[min(which(size==TRUE))]
```

```{r}
trip_components <-  melt(x,id.vars = c('trip_id',
                                       'start_latitude',
                                       'start_longitude',
                                       'end_latitude',
                                       'end_longitude'),
                        measure.vars = colnames(x)[20:316],
                        value.name = 'A+B',
                        sep='') 

trip_components <-   merge(trip_components,Link_dist,by='A+B') %>% arrange(trip_id)

###trips can go through our segment
###trips <- filter(trip_components,trip_components$`A+B` %in% CR_78_seg$Link)
####trip_ids <- trips[!duplicated(trips$trip_id),]

```

```{r}
###find the total distance for each Trip
tripflag_summary <- trip_components %>%
  group_by(trip_id)%>%
  summarise(Total_Dist = sum(DISTANCE))%>%
  arrange(desc(Total_Dist))

tripflag_summary <- merge(tripflag_summary,CR_78[,c(1,14:18)],by='trip_id')

datatable(tripflag_summary,filter='top')

```

```{r}
###attached total trip distance to each link
trip_comp <- merge(trip_components,tripflag_summary,
                         by.x='trip_id',by.y='trip_id')%>%
  arrange(desc(Total_Dist))

###summarise the trip distances by our links 
trip_details <- trip_comp %>% group_by(`A+B`) %>%
  summarise(Mean = mean(Total_Dist),
            Max = max(Total_Dist),
            Min = min(Total_Dist),
            Std = sd(Total_Dist))

###filter the trips for only our trips of interest
trips <- filter(trip_details,trip_details$`A+B` %in% CR_78_seg$Link)
datatable(trips,filter='top')
```



```{r,echo=FALSE,fig.height=5}

CR_78_plot <- merge(CR_78_seg,trips,by.x='Link',by.y='A+B')

CR_78_plot$label <- paste(CR_78_plot$AB,'Mean Dist:',as.character(round(CR_78_plot$Mean,2)))

leaflet(data=CR_78_plot,width = '100%') %>%
  setView(lng = -93.550825, lat =  44.771614, zoom = 13)%>%
  addPolylines(highlightOptions = highlightOptions(color = "white", weight = 2,
      bringToFront = TRUE),label=~label) %>% 
  addProviderTiles(providers$OpenStreetMap)

```



Start Locations
```{r,echo=FALSE,fig.height=5}
icon_start <- makeIcon('icon_start.png',iconWidth = 10, iconHeight = 8)
data <- tripflag_summary[tripflag_summary$Total_Dist<=10,]

leaflet(data=data,width = '100%') %>%
  setView(lng = -93.550825, lat =  44.721614, zoom = 10)%>%
  addTiles() %>% 
  addMarkers(~start_longitude,~start_latitude,label=~trip_id,icon = icon_start) %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$OpenStreetMap)

```
